QuestionType.name: MultipleChoice

QuestionType.name: MultipleResponse
QuestionType.description: Select one or more answers from a list

QuestionType.name: ShortAnswer

QuestionType.name: PolarQuestion
QuestionType.description: Select a single answer from two available

QuestionType.name: Sequence
QuestionType.description: Sort the answer list into the appropriate order

QuestionType.name: Matching
QuestionType.description: Join an item from each list with a similar meaning
